49  enum OrientationMode
50  {
51  OR_DEGREE_0 = 0,
52  OR_DEGREE_90 = 1,
53  OR_DEGREE_180 = 2,
54  OR_DEGREE_270 = 3,
55 
56  OR_PORTRAIT = OR_DEGREE_0,
57  OR_LANDSCAPERIGHT = OR_DEGREE_90,
58  OR_LANDSCAPELEFT = OR_DEGREE_270
59  };
